test-step.description: Given User on home page 'Oracle | Integrated Cloud Applications and Platform Services'
When User signed in, the text 'Account' must be displayed in place of Sign In
Then User Hover over on Account must open a panel showing 'Oracle Account' and 'cloud account'
Then User check Account panel must show 'name of the user', 'user email' , 'Sign Out' button and links to 'Account' and 'Help'
Then User Click on each of the links and verify navigation to appropriate page
